inspections.jurisdiction: San Francisco Department of Public Health

violations.description: Date-marking missing on prepared foods held more than 24 hours
violations.corrective_action: Label all prepped items immediately. Implement date-label audit at start and end of each shift.

violations.description: Chemical cleaning supplies stored without labels in utility closet
violations.corrective_action: Label all chemical containers per OSHA requirements within 24 hours. Relocate to designated chemical storage area.

inspections.jurisdiction: San Francisco Department of Public Health

violations.description: Permit or latest inspection report not posted in public view
violations.corrective_action: Print and post current permit and latest inspection report in customer-visible area within 24 hours.

violations.description: Ceiling vent above dishwashing station shows condensation buildup
violations.corrective_action: Schedule professional deep-cleaning of exhaust system within 7 days. Add monthly cleaning to maintenance calendar.

violations.description: Employee personal items stored in food preparation area
violations.corrective_action: Issue verbal warning to staff member. Retrain all kitchen staff on glove-use and hand-hygiene SOP.

inspections.jurisdiction: San Francisco Department of Public Health

violations.description: Handwashing sink blocked by equipment, not accessible to staff
violations.corrective_action: Submit maintenance request for repair within 14 days. Restrict use of affected area until repaired.

violations.description: Chemical cleaning supplies stored without labels in utility closet
violations.corrective_action: Label all chemical containers per OSHA requirements within 24 hours. Relocate to designated chemical storage area.

violations.corrective_action: Purchase and install calibrated thermometers within 48 hours. Add to weekly calibration checklist.

violations.description: Date-marking missing on prepared foods held more than 24 hours
violations.corrective_action: Label all prepped items immediately. Implement date-label audit at start and end of each shift.

violations.description: Pest control log not up to date or pest evidence found in dry storage
violations.corrective_action: Contact licensed pest control service for treatment within 72 hours. Update pest control log.

violations.description: Food contact surfaces not cleaned and sanitized between uses
violations.corrective_action: Deep-clean and re-sanitize affected surfaces. Verify sanitizer concentration with test strips. Restock supplies.

violations.corrective_action: Contact licensed pest control service for treatment within 72 hours. Update pest control log.

violations.corrective_action: Issue verbal warning to staff member. Retrain all kitchen staff on glove-use and hand-hygiene SOP.

violations.description: Grease buildup on exhaust hood and filters above cooking stations
violations.corrective_action: Schedule professional deep-cleaning of exhaust system within 7 days. Add monthly cleaning to maintenance calendar.

violations.description: Raw meat stored above ready-to-eat food in refrigeration unit
violations.corrective_action: Rearrange refrigeration to store raw proteins on lowest shelves. Retrain staff on proper storage hierarchy.
